issue.title: Empty Module Implementation
issue.description: The __init__.py file is completely empty, providing no implementation, exports, or documentation for the email notification service module
issue.recommendation: Implement email service functionality or add appropriate exports and documentation explaining the module's purpose and future plans

issue.title: Violates Project Pattern for Integration Modules
issue.description: According to project pattern #55, integration modules should have proper __init__.py with exports even if subdirectories handle specific implementations
issue.recommendation: Add __all__ exports and module documentation following the established project patterns for integration modules

issue.title: Missing Module Documentation
issue.description: No module docstring or comments explaining the purpose, status, or future plans for this email notification service
issue.recommendation: Add a module docstring explaining this is a placeholder awaiting implementation, similar to payment gateway and SMS modules

issue.title: No Clear Module Interface
issue.description: Module provides no clear interface or API for consumers to understand how to interact with email services
issue.recommendation: Define the expected interface (classes, functions, or exceptions) even if not yet implemented

issue.title: Ambiguous Module Status
issue.description: It's unclear whether this module is a placeholder, work-in-progress, or abandoned code
issue.recommendation: Add a clear status comment or raise NotImplementedError to indicate this is intentionally unimplemented

issue.title: Empty Python Module
issue.description: Empty __init__.py files can be valid for namespace packages but provide no value in an integration module context
issue.recommendation: Either implement the module or add a placeholder comment explaining the module's intended purpose

review.summary: This is an empty __init__.py file for the email notification service integration module. Based on project patterns, this appears to be a placeholder module awaiting implementation, similar to the payment gateway and SMS notification modules. The empty file violates project conventions that require integration modules to have proper exports and documentation.
